021import net.tnemc.bukkit.hook.economy.VaultHook;
022import net.tnemc.bukkit.hook.economy.VaultUnlockedHook;
023import net.tnemc.bukkit.hook.misc.PAPIHook;
024import net.tnemc.bukkit.hook.misc.PlaceHolderRule;
025import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.entity.EntityKilledListener;
026import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.inventory.ItemCraftListener;
027import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.player.PlayerCloseInventoryListener;
028import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.player.PlayerExperienceGainListener;
029import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.player.PlayerInteractListener;
030import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.player.PlayerJoinListener;
031import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.player.PlayerQuitListener;
032import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.server.PluginEnableListener;
033import net.tnemc.bukkit.listeners.world.WorldLoadListener;
034import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.TNECallbackProvider;
035import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.CurrencyFormatter;
036import net.tnemc.core.io.message.BaseTranslationProvider;
037import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
038import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.BukkitPluginCore;
039import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ServerConnector;
040import org.bstats.bukkit.Metrics;
041import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
042import org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin;
043
044import java.util.logging.Level;
045
046/**
047 * BukkitPlugin is the common class for any bukkit-based variant that will have its own package such
048 * as Paper/Folia.
049 *
050 * @author creatorfromhell
051 * @since 0.1.2.0
052 */
053public class BukkitPlugin {
054
055  private BukkitPluginCore pluginCore;
056  private BukkitCore core;
057  private boolean papiHooked = false;
058
059  /**
060   * Called when the plugin is loaded by the Bukkit plugin manager. This method should be used to
061   * initialize any necessary resources or data.
062   */
063  public void load(final JavaPlugin plugin, final ServerConnector server) {
064
065    //Initialize our TNE Core Class
066    this.core = new BukkitCore(plugin);
067    this.pluginCore = new ModifiedBukkitPluginCore(plugin, core, server, new BaseTranslationProvider(), new TNECallbackProvider());
068
069    //Vault
070    PluginCore.log().inform("Checking for VaultUnlocked");
071    try {
072      Class.forName("net.milkbowl.vault2.economy.Economy");
073      new VaultUnlockedHook().register();
074    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
075      PluginCore.log().error("Unable to connect to VaultUnlocked!");
076    }
077
078    PluginCore.log().inform("Checking for Vault");
079    try {
080      Class.forName("net.milkbowl.vault.economy.Economy");
081      new VaultHook().register();
082    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
083      PluginCore.log().error("Unable to connect to vault!");
084    }
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Called by the Bukkit plugin manager when the plugin is enabled. This method should be used to
089   * enable the functionality provided by this class.
090   */
091  public void enable(final JavaPlugin plugin) {
092
093    this.pluginCore.enable();
094
095    //Register our event listeners
096    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new EntityKilledListener(), plugin);
097    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new PlayerExperienceGainListener(), plugin);
098
099    //Player Listeners
100    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new PlayerJoinListener(), plugin);
101    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new PlayerQuitListener(), plugin);
102
103    //Menu-related Listeners from TNML
104    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new PlayerCloseInventoryListener(), plugin);
105    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new PlayerInteractListener(), plugin);
106
107    //World Listeners
108    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new WorldLoadListener(), plugin);
109
110    //Inventory Listeners
111    Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new ItemCraftListener(), plugin);
112
113    //Register our service providers.
114
115    //PAPI
116    if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().isPluginEnabled("PlaceholderAPI")) {
117      new PAPIHook().register();
118
119      CurrencyFormatter.addRule(new PlaceHolderRule());
120    } else {
121      Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new PluginEnableListener(), plugin);
122    }
123
124    final Metrics metrics = new Metrics(plugin, 602);
125
126    plugin.getLogger().log(Level.INFO, "The New Economy has been enabled!");
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Called by the Bukkit plugin manager when the plugin is disabled. This method should be used to
131   * disable the functionality provided by this class.
132   */
133  public void disable(final JavaPlugin plugin) {
134
135    this.pluginCore.onDisable();
136  }
137
138  public boolean isPapiHooked() {
139
140    return papiHooked;
141  }
142
143  public void setPapiHooked(final boolean papiHooked) {
144
145    this.papiHooked = papiHooked;
146  }
147}
